title: MAFS' Martha Kalifatidis suffers wardrobe malfunction in Los Angeles
text:
As one of Australia's most renowned Instagram models, Martha Kalifatidis isn't shy about publicly exposing herself.

But on Monday, the Married At First Sight fan favourite accidentally revealed more than she bargained for in a sheer top while out for dinner at celebrity hotspot Catch in Los Angeles.

The 31-year-old, who was with boyfriend Michael Brunelli, desperately tried to cover herself once she realised that her assets were on display.

Oh no! Married At First Sight's Martha Kalifatidis suffered a wardrobe malfunction while out in Los Angeles with boyfriend Michael Brunelli on Monday

The model was wearing a sheer white top, which revealed a bondage-style bra with no cups to cover the breasts underneath.

While Martha seemed confident to flaunt her enviable physique at first, she later became shy and bashfully placed her arm over her chest to protect her modesty.

With her free hand, the Aussie A-lister timidly clung to boyfriend Michael and allowed the Italian stallion to take charge and lead her through the throng of paparazzi.

Shy: The 31-year-old desperately tried to cover herself once she realised that her assets were on display

Lead the way! With her free hand, the Aussie A-lister timidly clung to boyfriend Michael and allowed the Italian stallion to take charge and lead her through the throng of paparazzi

Modest: Martha covered her chest with her free hand after realising that her top revealed more than she intended it to

Daring: The model was wearing a sheer white top, which revealed a bondage-style bra with no cups to cover the breasts underneath

Since skyrocketing to super-stardom on Married At First Sight earlier this year, Martha has emerged as one of Australia's most popular Instagram influencers.

She now leads a life of luxury, attending celebrity events each week and jetting from Cairns to Mexico on sponsored trips.

The pint-sized star has worked with major brands, from fashion powerhouse Pretty Little Thing to chart-topping apps like ShopBack.

Casual: School teacher Michael wore a casual ensemble, sporting pants, a T-shirt and sneakers

Let's go! Martha seemed keen to flee the scene after dining at the popular restaurant

Sheer daring! Underneath the sheer white top, Martha had a bondage-style bra with no cups

Over it? After covering herself up, Martha decided to bare all as she hastily marched towards her car

In July, she wore sheet masks from burgeoning Aussie beauty brand Aceology, causing them to completely sell out the next day.

In addition to her Instagram account, Martha also boasts thousands of followers on YouTube, where she dishes advice on hair, makeup, and cosmetic surgery.

Earlier this year, the Greek glamour girl admitted to using plastic surgery to achieve sculpt her enviable looks.

In addition to a nose job at 22, Martha also sports breast implants, not to mention the Botox and fillers she uses to keep her complexion flawless and wrinkle-free.
description: As one of Australia's most renowned Instagram models, Martha Kalifatidis isn't shy about publicly exposing herself.
